column2: Red Team, you are less than a klik from the LZ.
Hold, lads! Naught shall defeat us.
Oh god, oh fuck, oh god, oh fuck.
Lambs to the slaughter, all of you.
we have roughly a 69% chance of success
in a full frontal assault on Xenomedusozoa colonies...
I've been waiting for this day...
Red team, you are 500 meters from drop.
Get ready, we drop on my say so.
This is it. This is how I die.
Keep formation, and we'll pull through!
